References TNT::UnitLowerTriangularView< MaTRiX >::A_, TNT::UnitLowerTriangularView< MaTRiX >::one, and TNT::UnitLowerTriangularView< MaTRiX >::zero.

    { 
#ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
        assert(1<=i);
        assert(i<=A_.dim(1));
        assert(1<=j);
        assert(j<=A_.dim(2));
        assert(0<=i && i<A_.dim(0) && 0<=j && j<A_.dim(1));
#endif
        if (i>j)
            return A_(i,j);
        else if (i==j)
            return one;
        else 
            return zero;
    }
